attributes.action: end the discrimination and police persecution of John Henry Sayers and allow him a trial with a jury!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want to end the unjustified decisions and total discrination and persecution of John Henry Sayers. Allow him his human rights and a trial with a jury! Stop the police harrassment and ongoing campaign to damage his reputation and convict him at any cost.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
